name: 蔡舜宏
objective: 本課程主要探討多輸入多輸出系統(MIMO)其系統行為之描述，內容包括MIMO系統之穩定性分析、觀察性分析及其控制器設計，並探討MIMO系統的物理觀念及其數學描述的各種方法，是線性系統之進階課程，適合碩士班以上之學生學習。
schedule:
Week 1) Introductions
Week 2) Mathematical Background 1
Week 3) Mathematical Background 2
Week 4) System Solutions
Week 5) System Properties
Week 6) Stability
Week 7) Quiz
Week 8) Controllability
Week 9) Observability
Week 10) Midterm Exam.
Week 11) State Feedback and Estimation
Week 12) Controller and Observer
Week 13) Polynomial Fraction Description
Week 14) Nonlinear System Properties
Week 15) Nonlinear System and Control
Week 16) Stability Condition for Nonlinear System 
Week 17) Stabilization Condition for Nonlinear System 
Week 18) Final Exam.
materials:
Linear System Theory and Design-Third Edition, Chi-Tsong Chen, Oxford University Press
W. J. Rugh, Linear System Theory, 2nd Ed., Prentice-Hall Inc.,
1996.
T. Kailath, Linear Systems, Prentice-Hall Inc., 1980.
? T. K. Moon and W. C. Stirling, Mathematical Methods and
Algorithms for Signal Processing, Prentice-Hall Inc., 2000.
? R. A. Horn and C. A. Johnson, Matrix Analysis, Cambridge
University Press, 1985.
